text: Ruhla is a German city in the west of Thuringia. Next bigger Cities are Eisenach and Erfurt. About 6,500 people live there. == Sights == There is a park with miniatures of sights of Thuringia in Ruhla. The town has a rare angle church called St. Concordia. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Urban Districts of Thuringia
title: Ruhla
